subject: feat: global filters across all dashboard tabs
body:
- Move filter bar above tabs (always visible)
- Add filter indicator showing "X of Y" when active
- Apply filters to all tabs (Work, Health, etc.) not just Activity
- Update all render functions to use getFilteredCommits()
- Preserve filter state across repo switches with validation

Previously filters only affected the commit list on the Activity tab. Now all charts, stats, and breakdowns respect the active filters.
